points.val: Implemented the cryptographic hash function SHA 3 capable of creating a hash digest of an input
Showed the avalanche property of the algorithm, and that the messaged will be hashed and collisions be rare and computationally infeasible to find
Actively contributed to the development of the Open Source software, Expertiza
Created business logic for efficient team creation and assignment allocation according to student preferences
Refactored data tables and incorporated resulting code changes

Created a discrete event simulation implementation which models a M/M/1 queue with an exponential inter arrival rate, variable buffer length and an exponential service time for each packet in the system

Created a peer to peer file sharing system using socket programming where each node acts as a hybrid server and client and a central file indexing directed server which uses a collection to manage the file indexes based on active nodes and file availability
